QuestData.Title: Duskwing, Oh How I Hate Thee...
QuestData.Description: I have seen many things in my day, $r. The peaks of Mt. Hyjal... the oddities of Outland... a wall of Scourge soldiers, proceeding into war. But I have never seen a bat as big, or as shockingly white, as Duskwing.$B$BHow he taunts me from his roost!$b$bThis albino demon bat circles to the southwest of here, due north of Blackwood Lake. Track him down and destroy him. If he flies too high for you to reach, use my flare to get his attention.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: How he taunts me from his roost!
QuestData.LogDescription: Obtain a Patch of Duskwing's Fur.
QuestData.CompletionText: I hope you've done away with that creature.
QuestData.RewardText: Excellent work. I can now continue my work without the distractions of that great white beast.$b$bI shall fashion this fur into something you can use.
